events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because the size I received does not fit me at all.
The system has classified this issue under Refund since the customer is requesting their money back due to an incorrect size.
A customer support representative has been assigned to assist the customer with their refund request regarding the incorrectly sized jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund for the jacket that didn’t fit correctly.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
Thanks for your quick response. My order number is 123456789, and the jacket is brand new, still with tags attached.
We can offer you a full refund upon receipt of the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid shipping label to make the return process easy.
That sounds perfect, thank you! I appreciate the prepaid shipping label to return the jacket hassle-free.
I have emailed you the return shipping label. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm we received your returned jacket. Your refund has now been processed and should appear on your statement shortly.
Thank you for contacting support. We are closing this case now. Please reach out if you have any other questions or issues in the future.
